wikipedia_page.main: David Andrews (born 23 October 1939) is a British former racing driver.Andrews competed part-time in the World Sportscar Championship from 1985 to 1988 and the IMSA Camel GTP Championship in 1986 and 1987.

* David Andrews (actor) (born 1952), American actor
